title: Looking for awesome people :D
body:
Hey guys and Gals

So I'm putting this out there that I'm in search for some awesome companions who want to play a few times out of the week. I'm on here nearly everyday.
I don't care if you're ranked or not, I'm not ranked :) I'm just a noob trying to find players who are like minded and want to have a good gaming experience.
I haven't played many normal games, i get a little bit intimidated. I really want to start playing normal games i'm just a chicken and get freaked out. Also if there is anyone out there who wants to teach me how to player better, please feel free to add me :D i take criticism well (that has to be some sort of a bonus)

replies.body:
I don't know how to add you lol.
I play ranked a fair bit. want a team tho
lol ill add you when i jump back on tomorrow :D
Fuckhead would be Honoured to play with you. I don't rage
Firstly, LOVE the name :D its pretty epic lol. Sweet as, I try not to give people a reason to rage at my retardness lol :D
Does that mean FuckHead Has found his one true partner?
Feel free to add me if you want, I've spent waaaaaaay too much time in normals being conventional and unconventional, so I can give you some tips :P

I'll help as long as the others are reasonable. E.g they can stun carries in team fights, listen to jg for best decision concerning legendary monsters and if they start to lose lane play safer. And they don't go a 3v1 range at someone because they make a mistake. And people just mute people annoying them, so the don't go tilt. I'm tired of trying to make peace between people. But most these people seem cool, probs work
sweet, see you on the battle grounds when the stupid server is running :D
Shoot us an add if you want! :P
Definitely :D i'll try not act like such a noobatron with my unskilled ways with champs lol
I will thanks, have to wait for the stupid server...
sure id be willing to help you
Thank you so much!! I really want to start playing properly, i just lack confidence and skills :) ill add you now.
